title: Offline Edge Audit: SBOM, Checksums, and QR‑Verified Manifests
summary: Make offline edge deployments auditable with SBOMs, hashes, and QR‑encoded manifests.
bodyMd:
## Why
Air‑gapped deployments still need trust.

## How
- SBOM for binaries and models
- SHA‑256 manifest and signatures
- QR‑encoded manifest hash for on‑site checks

## Platform Tie‑In
Packaging generates the manifest; Reporting archives evidence for procurement.
